mapper.select: SELECT EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AS grpFaclCd /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ FROM EZC_FACL ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.GRP_FACL_CD(+) AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.FACL_CD(+) AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_GOODS_CD = #{partnerGoodsCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD

SELECT NVL(EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_IN_DD, #{checkInDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AS checkInDd /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,NVL(EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_OUT_DD, #{checkOutDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AS checkOutDd /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AS grpFaclCd /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_FACL.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_FACL.AREA_CD AS areaCd /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,NVL(EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.ROOM_MIN_PRICE, #{roomMinPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) AS roomMinPrice /* 객실 최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,NVL(EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.SP_ROOM_MIN_PRICE, #{spRoomMinPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) AS spRoomMinPrice /* 특가최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,NVL(EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.ROOM_NET_PRICE, #{roomNetPrice, jdbcType=DECIMAL}) AS roomNetPrice ,NVL(EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.SP_ROOM_NET_PRICE, #{spRoomNetPrice, jdbcType=DECIMAL}) AS spRoomNetPrice ,EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd FROM EZC_FACL ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.GRP_FACL_CD(+) AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.FACL_CD(+) AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_GOODS_CD = #{partnerGoodsCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_IN_DD AS checkInDd /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_OUT_DD AS checkOutDd /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.GRP_FACL_CD AS grpFaclCd /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.AREA_CD AS areaCd /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.ROOM_MIN_PRICE AS roomMinPrice /* 객실 최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.SP_ROOM_MIN_PRICE AS spRoomMinPrice /* 특가최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.ROOM_NET_PRICE roomNetPrice ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.SP_ROOM_NET_PRICE spRoomNetPrice ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.PARTNER_CD partnerCd FROM EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT /* CACHE 최저가 정보 */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG /* CACHE 검색 로그 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL /* 맵핑 시설 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL /* 맵핑 그룹 시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_IN_DD = EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_IN_DD AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_OUT_DD = EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_OUT_DD AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CITY_CD = EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CITY_CD AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.AREA_CD = EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.AREA_CD AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_IN_DD = #{checkInDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8), EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT_PK(P),FK_EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG_EZC_CA(R),SYS_C0011160(C) */ AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_OUT_DD = #{checkOutDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8), EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT_PK(P),FK_EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG_EZC_CA(R),SYS_C0011161(C) */ AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT_PK(P),FK_EZC_MAPPING_FACL_EZC_CACHE_(R),SYS_C0011162(C) */ AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT_PK(P),FK_EZC_MAPPING_FACL_EZC_CACHE_(R),SYS_C0011163(C) */ AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10), EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT_PK(P),FK_EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG_EZC_CA(R),SYS_C0011164(C) */ AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10), EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT_PK(P),FK_EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG_EZC_CA(R),SYS_C0011165(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT /* CACHE 최저가 정보 */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG /* CACHE 검색 로그 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL /* 맵핑 시설 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL /* 맵핑 그룹 시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_IN_DD = EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_IN_DD AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_OUT_DD = EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_OUT_DD AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CITY_CD = EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CITY_CD AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.AREA_CD = EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.AREA_CD AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD
AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_IN_DD = #{checkInDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_OUT_DD = #{checkOutDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.ROOM_MIN_PRICE = #{roomMinPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 객실 최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.SP_ROOM_MIN_PRICE = #{spRoomMinPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 특가최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_IN_DD AS checkInDd /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_OUT_DD AS checkOutDd /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.GRP_FACL_CD AS grpFaclCd /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.AREA_CD AS areaCd /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.ROOM_MIN_PRICE AS roomMinPrice /* 객실 최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.SP_ROOM_MIN_PRICE AS spRoomMinPrice /* 특가최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.ROOM_NET_PRICE roomNetPrice ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.SP_ROOM_NET_PRICE spRoomNetPrice ,EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.PARTNER_CD partnerCd FROM EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT /* CACHE 최저가 정보 */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG /* CACHE 검색 로그 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL /* 맵핑 시설 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL /* 맵핑 그룹 시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_IN_DD = EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_IN_DD AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_OUT_DD = EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_OUT_DD AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CITY_CD = EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CITY_CD AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.AREA_CD = EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.AREA_CD AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD
AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_IN_DD = #{checkInDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_OUT_DD = #{checkOutDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.ROOM_MIN_PRICE = #{roomMinPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 객실 최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.SP_ROOM_MIN_PRICE = #{spRoomMinPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 특가최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */
ORDER BY EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT.CHECK_IN_DD DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT SET /* CACHE 최저가 정보 */ ROOM_MIN_PRICE = #{roomMinPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 객실 최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,SP_ROOM_MIN_PRICE = #{spRoomMinPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 특가최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,ROOM_NET_PRICE = #{roomNetPrice, jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,SP_ROOM_NET_PRICE = #{spRoomNetPrice, jdbcType=DECIMAL} WHERE 1=1 AND CHECK_IN_DD = #{checkInDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND CHECK_OUT_DD = #{checkOutDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CACHE_MIN_AMT /* CACHE 최저가 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CHECK_IN_DD = #{checkInDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND CHECK_OUT_DD = #{checkOutDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
